pesticide.PPE: Long-sleeved shirt and long pants, socks and shoes, waterproof gloves

Active_Ingredients.name: Glyphosate, N-(phosphonomethyl)glycine, potassium salt
Active_Ingredients.mode_Of_Action: Inhibits an enzyme essential to amino acid formation in plants and microorganisms

Safety_Information.general_Info: CAUTION: Causes moderate eye irritation. Avoid contact with eyes, skin, or clothing. Wear long-sleeved shirt and long pants, socks and shoes. Prolonged or frequently repeated skin contact may cause allergic reactions in some individuals. Follow manufacturer’s instructions for cleaning/maintaining PPE.
Safety_Information.if_In_Eyes: Hold eye open and rinse slowly and gently with water for 15 to 20 minutes. Remove contact lenses, if present, after the first 5 minutes, then continue rinsing eye. Call a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.
Safety_Information.if_On_Skin: Take off contaminated clothing. Rinse skin immediately with plenty of water for 15 to 20 minutes. Call a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.
Safety_Information.physician_Note: Have the product container or label with you when calling a poison control center or doctor, or going for treatment.

Application_Info.max_product_per_acre_per_season: 64.0 fluid ounces per acre per year
